question: Based on the context of "Transformers II" and the mentioned NLP tasks, what might have been covered in the "Transformers I" lesson (Lesson 9)?
response: Lesson 9, titled "Transformers I," likely covered the limitations of Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and introduced the Transformer architecture. The lesson focused on the core components of the Transformer model, emphasizing the mechanism of self-attention.
